text: Velit Bay Plantation is a plantation on the east coast of Espiritu Santo, Vanuatu. It lies on Velit Bay, and consists of over 1600 acres of plantation and forest. The plantation caters to tourists and contains a restaurant. ==References== ==External links== *Official site Category:Tourist attractions in Vanuatu Category:Sanma Province Category:Espiritu Santo
title: Velit Bay Plantation
